{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#花柳香子#京都方言，古典艺能，和风形象……本以为过分鲜明的标签会是你前进的阻碍，但这怎么可能！毕竟你要征服世界呢！任何角色在你这里，你的特色中最契合的部分都会巧妙地得到放大，把角色染上自己的颜色。这莫非就是征服者的天分？！\n今天会吃到同学们张罗的哪些美食呢？生日快乐呀，花柳香子同学[么么哒]","id":59901734,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":675,"img_size":136.93,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/44310c3be0bfac76eaf8465e3f9e5de4a9622325.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":900},{"img_height":1109,"img_size":345.16,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/bc5925e11e095157e1a5362bd7576b7b6cb54937.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1479},{"img_height":480,"img_size":58.93,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/85ab83c02cf15f15b9812bb172ffcbc71b3fc089.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":640},{"img_height":1109,"img_size":243.61,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/8dd291e00319d4dc022fcee087517be745d8f353.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1479},{"img_height":271,"img_size":28.2,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/d737b435f8220c9e099af69f431553fc9ecc5fe6.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":480},{"img_height":576,"img_size":45.11,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/6a70f3277f3390f9fa63ada4437d7b760f6dd269.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1024},{"img_height":750,"img_size":162.5,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/d9d4b25f7408ea8200e29c164321fed66591456f.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1334},{"img_height":935,"img_size":214.33,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/53d36eabe12cea6a1108b013f8f4ecf05a772d5b.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2000},{"img_height":835,"img_size":102.08,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/c275801eef66f1520746f3ce45af769d1bfa293c.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":834}],"pictures_count":9,"reply":72,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1583224310},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_d
